item.title: Mentioned by TbNewsWatch.com
item.description:
Harper ducking: Hyer
Bruce Hyer says Prime Minister Stephen Harper should stop ducking the senate scandal and face the music. The independent MP (Thunder Bay-Superior North), says Harper's decision to prorogue Parliament until October, a month-long delay in reconvening the House of Commons, is a clear indication the prime minister wants to avoid answering senate-related questions. Several senators, including Conservatives Pamela Wallin and Mike Duffy and Liberal Mac Harb have faced questions about their expenses.
